A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a Star Wars fan since 1977 with Empire Strikes Back as my favorite. I watched The Last Jedi three times already. The movie connects the teachings of Qui-Gon Jinn\, the mistakes of Yoda and Obi-Wan Kenobi\, the struggles of Anakin\, and the impulsive nature of Luke Skywalker. It shows the strength of Leia Organa. Those who hated her Mary Poppins scene - my first thought was Chris Pratt and Zoe in Guardians of the Galaxy. I love Rey\, Ben\, Poe and Finn. The battle scenes seemed tedious to me\, but the story was good. This is a movie for a new generation of Star Wars fans.
